bug.author: jlewi
bug.summary: Error: couldn't get resource list for custom.metrics.k8s.io/v1beta1: the server is currently unable to handle the request
bug.description:
/kind bug What steps did you take and what happened: Spurious error message from kfctl when deploying on GCP Kfctl prints the following error out <denchmark-code>E1025 15:22:05.967555 43645 memcache.go:135] couldn't get resource list for custom.metrics.k8s.io/v1beta1: the server is currently unable to handle the request </denchmark-code>
This error appears to be harmless but it will confuse users so we should figure out where its coming from and suppress it.

comments.comment: Issue-Label Bot is automatically applying the label kind/bug to this issue, with a confidence of 0.99. Please mark this comment with üëç or üëé to give our bot feedback! Links: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/marketplace/issue-label-bot>app homepage</denchmark-link> , <denchmark-link:https://mlbot.net/data/kubeflow/kubeflow>dashboard</denchmark-link> and <denchmark-link:https://github.com/hamelsmu/MLapp>code</denchmark-link> for this bot.
A quick mitigation would be to have apply print out a success message when its done so that users know the deployment succeeded. cc <denchmark-link:https://github.com/lluunn>@lluunn</denchmark-link>

Using basic auth on GCP and kubeflow/kbueflow - v0.7.0-rc.7-3-g8dbde9d8 kubeflow/manifests - v0.7.0-rc.2-19-g317c0d8 I see the success message added by <denchmark-link:https://github.com/kubeflow/kubeflow/pull/4443>#4443</denchmark-link> but I don't see the custom metrics error. <denchmark-code>INFO[0568] Downloading secret user-gcp-sa from namespace kubeflow filename="gcp/gcp.go:1835" INFO[0568] Creating secret user-gcp-sa to namespace kubeflow-jlewi filename="gcp/gcp.go:1840" INFO[0568] Generating PodDefault in namespace kubeflow-jlewi; APIVersion kubeflow.org/v1alpha1 filename="gcp/gcp.go:1770" INFO[0575] Applied the configuration Successfully! filename="cmd/apply.go:72" </denchmark-code>

With IAP <denchmark-code>E1104 05:56:10.033789 242816 memcache.go:135] couldn't get resource list for custom.metrics.k8s.io/v1beta1: the server is currently unable to handle the request INFO[0639] Applied the configuration Successfully! filename="cmd/apply.go:72" </denchmark-code>
So we still have the error about custom metrics but we have the success metric after it. Downgrading to P2 because this looks like a fit and finish issue now to figure out what to do about the spurious error message.
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has not had recent activity. It will be closed if no further activity occurs. Thank you for your contributions.
